Description: Position Title: Art DirectorCompany profile:Our client is an entrepreneur in spirit, who truly believe that ordinary is the road to nowhere. they are an integrated communication company and they believe in concrete, palpable results. They are currently looking to hire an experienced Art Director to join their team in Beirut, LebanonThe Role:As an Art Director, you will be responsible for conceptualizing and executing visually compelling and innovative ideas for various advertising campaigns. Your role will involve leading the artistic direction, collaborating with copywriters and designers, and overseeing the creative process from inception to final execution.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Design, Fine Arts, Graphic Design, or a related field. A Master's degree is a plus.
Proven experience as an Art Director or a similar creative leadership role within an advertising company or creative agency.
Outstanding portfolio showcasing a diverse range of creative work, demonstrating expertise in various mediums, including print, digital, and video.
Proficiency in design software and tools, such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and other relevant applications.
Strong leadership and management skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate a creative team.
Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate artistic concepts and ideas effectively.
A strategic thinker with a deep understanding of branding, visual storytelling, and the ability to translate client objectives into compelling artistic solutions.
Strong attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics, composition, and visual impact.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and meet tight deadlines.

Lead the artistic direction and conceptualization of advertising campaigns, ensuring alignment with client briefs, brand guidelines, and campaign objectives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including copywriters, designers, and strategists, to develop cohesive and impactful creative concepts.

Oversee the development of visually stunning designs for various advertising materials, such as print ads, digital banners, social media content, and video campaigns.
Ensure that all creative concepts effectively convey key messages, evoke emotions, and resonate with the target audience.

Lead and mentor a team of designers and collaborate with copywriters, providing guidance, feedback, and support to foster their professional growth.
Foster a collaborative and creative work environment, encouraging teamwork, experimentation, and excellence in design.

Present creative concepts and ideas to clients, articulating the artistic vision and storytelling behind the designs.
Incorporate client feedback and insights into the creative process, ensuring client satisfaction and alignment with their expectations.

Oversee the execution of creative campaigns, ensuring that the final output meets the highest standards of quality and creativity.
Collaborate with production teams and external vendors to ensure the smooth production and delivery of creative materials.

Stay updated on industry trends, emerging design technologies, and best practices to drive innovation and maintain a competitive edge.
Integrate new artistic techniques and tools to enhance the creative process and deliver cutting-edge design solutions.
